metadata.name: My Heart
metadata.description:
My Heart is a handmade original Sculpted Painting, acrylic and mixed media on canvas 12.5in x 12.5in x 2in.  My Heart can be framed, but is ready for display.

This piece is 1 of a series in a limited edition by L. Scooter Morris of the "Interpretations” collection of original works of art. Each original has a limited edition of Giclée prints.

The high resolution photo of My Heart taken for this digital certificate of authenticity was taken on 8/25/21

This NFT belongs to the 1/1 physical Sculpted Painting of My Heart as proof of authenticity.

L. Scooter Morris maintains ownership of the intellectual property and image and reserves the right to make reproductions, Giclées, and other materials and merchandise. All reproductions are of a limited series.
